typetodo.logic

Class Schedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • typetodo.logic.Schedule

  • public class Schedule
extends java.lang.Object
    The Schedule class provides the necessary API needed to manage (CRUD) the Tasks in the Schedule.
    Author:
    A0091024U

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> search(java.lang.String keyword)
        Searches the schedule and returns a list of Tasks which contain the given keyword in their TITLE/DESCRIPTION.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Keyword to search
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Tasks which contain the given keyword in their TITLE/DESCRIPTION.

      • getTasksByDateRange

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getTasksByDateRange(org.joda.time.DateTime start,
                                            org.joda.time.DateTime end,
                                            Task.Status status)
                                              throws InvalidDateRangeException
        Gets a list of all the tasks from Schedule that falls within the given date range. If start and end are both null, a list of all tasks from Schedule would be returned.
        Parameters:
        start - Lower date bound of range
        end - Upper date bound of range
        status - Status of task. COMPLETED/INCOMPLETE
        Returns:
        returns a list of either tasks which falls under a given date range, or all tasks in the schedule
        Throws:
        InvalidDateRangeException - if given date range is invalid

      • getAllTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getAllTasks(Task.Status status)
        Returns a list of all the tasks in the schedule, filtered by the given status. E.g, if status is COMPLETED, a list of all completed tasks in the schedule would be returned. Optionally filtered by a given Task status.
        Parameters:
        status - Status of task, COMPLETED/INCOMPLETE/null
        Returns:
        returns an ArrayList of tasks

      • getFloatingTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getFloatingTasks(Task.Status status)
        Returns all Floating Tasks in the Schedule, filtered by a given Task status. Optionally filtered by a given Task status.
        Parameters:
        status - Status of task, COMPLETED/INCOMPLETE/null
        Returns:
        returns a list of all Floating Tasks found in the Schedule.

      • getDeadlineTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getDeadlineTasks(Task.Status status)
        Returns all Deadline Tasks in the Schedule, filtered by a given Task status. Optionally filtered by a given Task status.
        Parameters:
        status - Status of task, COMPLETED/INCOMPLETE/null
        Returns:
        returns a list of all Deadline Tasks found in schedule

      • getTimedTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getTimedTasks(Task.Status status)
        Returns all Timed Tasks in the Schedule, filtered by a given Task status. Optionally filtered by a given Task status.
        Parameters:
        status - Status of task, COMPLETED/INCOMPLETE/null
        Returns:
        returns a list of all Timed Tasks found in schedule

        public Task getTask(int taskId)
             throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        taskId - task id of task
        Returns:
        returns the tasks with the give task id
        Throws:
